project.title: [Client Redacted] - Cloud Centre of Expertise
project.role: AWS Cloud DevSecOps Architect & Platform Engineer

challenge.summary: Implement a secure and scalable managed public cloud environment using AWS Landing Zone foundations while meeting operational and security requirements and achieving full Authority to Operate (ATO) for production workloads.

deliverables: Architectural design and strategy in collaboration with AWS team
Infrastructure as Code development using Terraform, AWS SDK, and AWS CLI
CI/CD pipeline implementation (AWS CodeBuild, CodeDeploy, Azure Pipelines)
IT Security Program establishment meeting ITSG standards
SSO Federation integration with Azure Active Directory
Automated security and governance compliance tooling

outcomes: ✅ Full ATO (Authority to Operate) status achieved
✅ Secure, scalable managed cloud environment for internal business users
✅ Enhanced security posture exceeding GoC ITSG requirements
✅ Streamlined development and operations through integrated DevOps practices
✅ Azure AD SSO federation enabling secure identity management
